p: To calculate IC 50 logarithmic curve was made for the original curve then added the trend line from which was obtained the required equation from which IC 50 values were calculated as revealed in Table 3 and Figure 3. However, the IC 50 for Trolox was calculated using the following equation; y = 37.96x + 37.73, from which IC 50 value was 2.09±0.17 µg/ml.
